item.description: Join me for a 6 or 8 mile run along the Charles next Sunday (distances are approximate). I run a 9 1/2 minute mile, but can run slower if need be. I can also push myself to run faster (and probably should), but if you are hoping to do 8 minute miles, I'm not your gal. We'll meet at Panera Bread on Arsenal Street in Watertown. There's lots of free parking in the area. Please let me know if you'd like to join me.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the sleepy looking gal out in front of Panera

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Sunday Morning Run Along the Charles- November 7th
